attributes.action: Boycot South African goods & Holiday as they support the genocide in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As governments talk and the UN talks and people are being killed in Zimbabwe the easy way for the normal everyday people of the UK who feel sick at the "talking" and "talking" but never any action is simply to boycot the one country who can do something but choose not to South Africa. So let stop buying products from them and they will at least feel something.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
